description: Want to learn more about how to use your Palm® webOS™ phone? The Palm Videos App includes a variety of useful videos that highlight the features of the webOS platform. Learn all about how webOS allows you to easily use multiple applications at the same time. See how to keep your Calendars and Contacts up to date automatically with integration with Yahoo!, Google™, Facebook®, Linkedln®, and more.  You can also learn about the way Palm webOS apps are integrated with each other, and find out how to add cool apps like 3D games. There are even videos that feature all the amazing things you can do with the Palm Touchstone™ Charging Dock, which lets you charge your device without attaching any wires to it.
